section.section: The Governor shall appoint the appointed members and shall designate a chairman from among the members.

text.section: Before taking office each appointee to the Commission shall take the oath required by Article I, § 9 of the Maryland Constitution.

section.section: The term of an appointed member is 3 years.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
An appointed member may not serve more than 2 consecutive terms.

text.section: The Governor may remove a member for incompetence or misconduct.
